caption:
🍝GIVEAWAY 🍝Three $200 Resy Gift Cards! Random Acts of Giving, Giveaway #4: The gift of the feast. 

Steakhouse or seafood? Brunch or dinner? Today we are giving you the gift to choose your own eating adventure and take someone you care about along for the feast. This holiday season, your next restaurant experience  is on US. 

How to enter: 

1️⃣ Follow @connectRNapp. 
2️⃣ Like this post.
3️⃣ Comment and tag a friend, family member, or anyone you want to take out for a nice meal this holiday season. 

Winners will be announced on Wednesday, December 20th in our stories.

Winners must be located in the United States and must be 18 years or older at the time of entry. This contest is not affiliated with Instagram or Facebook. By participating or entering, you agree to release Instagram of all liability.

This nurse said it best: “If I had 100 dollars this Holliday I would love to take my BF and daughter out to eat on me!!!! Love when we are able to enjoy ourselves as a family.” 

#RandomActsofGiving #Gratitude #ClinicianAppreciation #RNs #LPNs #NursingStudent #ListenToNurses #NurseGiveaway #CNAs #NurseLife
